attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i am a law abiding citizen, i was in my youth( aged 14-17) convicted of various offences such as stealing cars and burgling non dwelling properties,i now am working for the local ambulace service and very much a law abiding person, why should my past criminal record be brought up everytime i apply for an internal posistion within my service after all these years of being "rehabilitated" it is unfair to many other people such a me, i understand that your criminal record should stay with you if you have been convicted of crimes against children, elderly, violence etc but not for a miss spent youth!
my criminal record has followed me all my life and caused me great problems, at one stage almost costing me my career

rejection.details: Your title and e-petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
